heading: This Afternoon
text: Mostly cloudy, except decreasing clouds in the St. Lawrence Valley. Scattered sprinkles, mainly northeast, and in the southern Greens.

heading: Tuesday Night
text: Partly cloudy in the Champlain and St. Lawrence valleys. Mostly cloudy elsewhere, with the slight chance of a sprinkle.

heading: Wednesday
text: Periods of clouds, then increasing sun west and south. Chance of a sprinkle in the northern mountains.

heading: Thursday
text: Clearing, except remaining mostly cloudy northeast.
